data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Quezaltenango.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Quezaltenango, Guatemala
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Quezaltenango, Guatemala. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Quezaltenango.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 166,519 believers in the state of Quezaltenango to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, help the people of Quezaltenango, Guatemala to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 166,519 believers in Quezaltenango, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Quezaltenango, Guatemala has a population of 667,100.

We estimate Quezaltenango has 166,519 people who might know Jesus, 469,257 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 31,324 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Quezaltenango. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;
